page.title: 17Tollerton School continued
page.content: Harvest produce to the Cheshire Home in Alne.We make novelties for our own stall at the Fayre.This year we are making sweets for our stall.We have three sports cups,one for infants,one for lower juniors and one for upper juniors.Tollerton School is closing in July,1986.The children will be going to a new school at Shipton,a nearby village in September,1986. Tollerton Playgroup meets twice a week in the Village Hall.During the morning sessions children enjoy painting,modelling,sand and water play and games.Their favourite activity is waterplay.Some children have been sucessful when entering their work for Tollerton Show.The age range is from three to five years. A Mother and Toddler group meet on Tuesdays. Children under three years attend.
